'''All Streams Flow to the Sea''' is [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]'s [[Level 5 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
*The Chinese and Japanese names {{Lang|One Hundred Rivers Merge into the Sea|zh=百川集海|zh_rm=Bǎi Chuān Jí Hǎi|ja=百川集海|ja_rm=Hyakusenshuukai{{Assumed}}|sort=zh,ja}} are references to {{Lang|''{{w|Bansenshūkai|Ten Thousand Rivers Merge into the Sea}}''|ja=万川集海|ja_rm=Bansenshuukai}}, a Japanese martial art book on ninjutsu compiled in 1678.
